comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: Thomas Riley Marshall (1854-1925) was Governor of Indiana when he received the nomination to be Woodrow Wilson's running mate in 1912. He served as Vice President for both of Wilson's terms.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the full name and contextual information. Will submit it for review and possible update to the catalog record.
